ing: 2 (6.5 ounce) jars marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
des: "Cheesy, creamy dip loaded with artichokes and garlic!  Serve with toasted french bread slices for a fantastic appetizer. To serve the dip hot, transfer to a medium baking dish and heat at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 20 minutes, or until bubbling and slightly browned."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix the cream cheese, artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, garlic, red bell pepper, Swiss cheese and green onions.
